meanings.definition: To examine thoroughly and make necessary repairs or adjustments.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic is overhauling the engine to fix any problems.
meanings.sent2: The team is overhauling their strategy to win the game.
meanings.sent3: She joked that she was overhauling her wardrobe to impress her friends.
meanings.sent4: The teacher is overhauling the lesson plan to make it more engaging.
meanings.sent5: Overhauling the garden transformed it into a beautiful oasis.

meanings.definition: To renovate or improve something significantly.
meanings.sent1: The company is overhauling its website to attract more customers.
meanings.sent2: They are overhauling the old house to make it modern and comfortable.
meanings.sent3: He pretended to be overhauling his cooking skills to impress his date.
meanings.sent4: Overhauling the business model brought in more profits than expected.
meanings.sent5: The artist is overhauling the painting to make it more vibrant and appealing.
